subject: World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Argentina demonstrated that it was ready, willing and able to erase the anguish of 2002, when it arrived at the World Cup as the favorite and exited unceremoniously after the first round.
snippet: Argentina demonstrated that it was ready, willing and able to erase the anguish of 2002, when it arrived at the World Cup as the favorite and exited unceremoniously after the first round.
